{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Magic | class = HereticSoundSequence8 | game = Heretic | doomednum = 1207 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SoundSequence|SoundSequence]]→<u>HereticSoundSequence8</u>
Plays sound sequence number 7 from the list of Heretic's environmental sound sequences.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HereticSoundSequence8</u> : {{Class|SoundSequence}} { {{Property|Args}} 7 }
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Magic environment 7 slot [[HereticAmbience]] playuntildone world/amb8 end
